beer.beer_description: A crisp, refreshing Hawaiian-style pale ale. Its signature copper color results from the unique blend of specialty roasted malts. The pronounced citrus-floral hop aroma comes from the liberal amounts of Galena, Cascade & Mt. Hood hops added to each brew.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 91)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 92!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 390 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 79!

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 165 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 34. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
